participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Alex enjoys expressing themselves through various forms of art and takes pride in their individuality.
participant_1.background: I enjoy working with my hands and seeing the results of my work. I love dancing. I will study computer science. I used to be very closed off about my sexuality. I'm trying to balance my school work with my social life and my workouts.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and compassionate, Jordan is passionate about teaching and deeply cares about the well-being and success of her students.
participant_2.background: I'm going to spend time with my family and friends. I just graduated college with my bachelor's degree in education. I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success. I draw comics. I like to dance with my friends.

content.text: Hey! I'm participant_1. What's your name?
Nice to meet you! What's your favorite thing to do?
I love dancing and drawing comics!
That's so cool! I love to dance too! What are some of your favorite dances?
I love to do all kinds of dances, but I'm especially good at ballet and hip hop.
Oh wow! That's awesome! I'm more of a jazz dancer myself.
Oh cool! I love jazz too! I actually just graduated from college with my bachelor's degree in education, and I'm going to be a teacher. I'm really excited to start my career!
That's so great! I'm sure you'll be a great teacher! What subjects are you going to teach?
I'm going to be teaching art and music.
Oh that's awesome! I love both art and music!
Me too! I'm so glad I found someone who shares my interests!
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone with similar interests.
Yeah, it is! Do you want to hang out sometime and dance together?
That would be so much fun!
Great! We can exchange numbers and set something up!
